REPORT.name: УЗ-Суммарно
REPORT.description: Отчет по учетным записям - сумма потраченных денег за определенный интервал --- Author: NodaSoft support@nodasoft.com
REPORT.code: select Accounts.[name] as [Имя учетной записи], SUM(AccountsHistory.[summa]) as [Сумма] from AccountsHistory inner join Accounts on (AccountsHistory.[idAccounts] = Accounts.[id]) where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) and AccountsHistory.[what]=0 GROUP BY Accounts.[name] order by Accounts.[name] asc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
